SELECT DISTINCT L.LCTRE_NO , L.LCTRE_NMPR , L.PRFSOR_NO , L.COURSE_NO , L.SEMSTR_SE , K.SEMSTR_YR , K.SEMSTR , (SELECT A.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE A WHERE A.COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC015' AND A.COM_CODE = L.LCTRE_SE) LCTRE_SE , (SELECT B.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE B WHERE B.COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC014' AND B.COM_CODE = L.COMPL_SE) COMPL_SE , (SELECT F.FCLTS_NM FROM FACILITIES F WHERE F.FCLTS_NO = L.FCLTS_NO) FCLTS_NM , (SELECT O.BULD_NM FROM BUILDING O, FACILITIES F WHERE O.BULD_NO = F.BULD_NO AND F.FCLTS_NO = L.FCLTS_NO) BULD_NM , U.COURSE_NM , U.COURSE_PNT , (SELECT N.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE N WHERE N.COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC011' AND N.COM_CODE = V.TMTB_SE ) TMTB_SE
FROM LECTURE L INNER JOIN SEMESTER K ON (K.SEMSTR_NO = L.SEMSTR_SE) INNER JOIN COURSE U ON (L.COURSE_NO = U.COURSE_NO) INNER JOIN LECTURE_TIMETABLE V ON (L.LCTRE_NO = V.LCTRE_NO)
WHERE L.PRFSOR_NO= #{prfsorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND K.SEMSTR_YR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND K.SEMSTR = CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM')) BETWEEN 1 AND 6 AND K.SEMSTR = 1 THEN 1 WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM')) BETWEEN 7 AND 12 AND K.SEMSTR = 2 THEN 2 END ORDER BY TMTB_SE ASC

SELECT DISTINCT O.STDNT_NO , O.LCTRE_NO , O.SCORE_OBJC_CN , (SELECT D.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE D WHERE D.com_code_grp = 'SEC013' AND D.COM_CODE = O.CONFM_SE) CONFM_SE , (SELECT D.COM_CODE FROM COM_CODE D WHERE D.com_code_grp = 'SEC013' AND D.COM_CODE = O.CONFM_SE) CONFM , O.SCORE_OBJC_RETURN , I.STDNT_NM , I.STDNT_TELNO , R.SKNRG_STTUS_GRADE ,(SELECT SUBJCT_NM FROM SUBJECT Y WHERE Y.SUBJCT_NO = R.SKNRG_STTUS_MAJOR1) SUBJCT_NM
FROM SCORE_OBJECTION O INNER JOIN STUDENT_INFORMATION I ON (I.STDNT_NO = O.STDNT_NO) INNER JOIN SCHOOL_REGISTER_STATUS R ON (R.STDNT_NO = O.STDNT_NO)
WHERE O.LCTRE_NO = #{lctreNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY CONFM , R.SKNRG_STTUS_GRADE

SELECT O.LCTRE_NO, O.STDNT_NO, O.SCORE_OBJC_CN, O.SCORE_OBJC_RETURN , (SELECT D.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE D WHERE D.COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC013' AND D.COM_CODE = O.CONFM_SE) CONFM_SE , (SELECT X.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE X WHERE X.COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC019' AND X.COM_CODE = A.SCORE_SE) SCORE_SE , A.SCORE_SCORE , (SELECT I.STDNT_NM FROM STUDENT_INFORMATION I WHERE I.STDNT_NO = O.STDNT_NO) STDNT_NM , (SELECT J.STDNT_TELNO FROM STUDENT_INFORMATION J WHERE J.STDNT_NO = O.STDNT_NO) STDNT_TELNO , R.SKNRG_STTUS_GRADE , R.SKNRG_STTUS_MAJOR1 , (SELECT C.SUBJCT_NM FROM SUBJECT C WHERE C.SUBJCT_NO = R.SKNRG_STTUS_MAJOR1) SUBJCT_NM , T.PRINT_SCORE , T.CAL_SCORE FROM SCORE_OBJECTION O, SCORE A, SCHOOL_REGISTER_STATUS R, SCORE_CHART T WHERE O.STDNT_NO = A.STDNT_NO AND O.LCTRE_NO = A.LCTRE_NO AND O.STDNT_NO = R.STDNT_NO AND A.SCORE_SCORE >= T.MIN_SCORE AND A.SCORE_SCORE <= T.MAX_SCORE AND O.LCTRE_NO = #{lctreNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND O.STDNT_NO = #{stdntNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT L.LCTRE_NO , A.STDNT_NO , (SELECT S.STDNT_NM FROM STUDENT_INFORMATION S WHERE S.STDNT_NO = A.STDNT_NO) STDNT_NM , (SELECT S.STDNT_TELNO FROM STUDENT_INFORMATION S WHERE S.STDNT_NO = A.STDNT_NO) STDNT_TELNO , (SELECT DISTINCT W.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE W, STUDENT_INFORMATION S WHERE W.COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC001' AND W.COM_CODE = S.SEXDSTN_SE AND ROWNUM = 1) SEXDSTN_SE , (SELECT R.SKNRG_STTUS_GRADE FROM SCHOOL_REGISTER_STATUS R WHERE R.STDNT_NO = A.STDNT_NO) SKNRG_STTUS_GRADE , (SELECT DISTINCT T.SUBJCT_NM FROM SCHOOL_REGISTER_STATUS R, SUBJECT T WHERE R.STDNT_NO = A.STDNT_NO AND T.SUBJCT_NO = R.SKNRG_STTUS_MAJOR1 AND ROWNUM = 1) SKNRG_STTUS_MAJOR1 , E.SCORE_SE , E.SCORE_SCORE
FROM LECTURE L INNER JOIN ATTENDANCE_LECTURE A ON (A.LCTRE_NO = L.LCTRE_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN SCORE E ON (E.LCTRE_NO =L.LCTRE_NO AND E.STDNT_NO = A.STDNT_NO) WHERE L.LCTRE_NO = #{lctreNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY E.SCORE_SCORE NULLS FIRST , SKNRG_STTUS_GRADE , STDNT_NM

SELECT (SELECT D.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE D WHERE D.COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC019' AND D.COM_CODE = SCORE_SE) SCORE_SE , LCTRE_ACNUTNO_NO , LCTRE_EVL_STDR_REFLCT
FROM LECTURE_EVALUATION_STANDARD
WHERE SUBSTR(LCTRE_ACNUTNO_NO,2) = #{lctreNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY SCORE_SE ASC
